characters.name: Amber
characters.title: Outrider of the Knights of Favonious
characters.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best - albeit only - Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

talents.name: Sharpshooter
talents.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.

talents.name: Explosive Puppet
talents.description: Baron Bunny continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

talents.name: Fiery Rain
talents.description: Fires of a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.

characters.name: Lisa
characters.title: Witch of Purple Rose
characters.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius who was deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

talents.name: Lightning Touch
talents.description: Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.

talents.name: Violet Arc
talents.description: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away. Releases a homing Lightning Orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to enemies in a small AoE.

talents.name: Lightning Rose
talents.description:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding enemies and dealing Electro DMG.

The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back enemies and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.

characters.name: Kaeya
characters.title: Cavalry Captain of the Knights of Favonius
characters.description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

talents.name: Ceremonial Bladework
talents.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes. When charged, consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

talents.name: Frostgnaw
talents.description: Unleashes a frigit blast, dealing Cryo DMG to enemies in front of Kaeya.

talents.name: Glacial Waltz
talents.description:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.

These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to enemies in their path for so long as they persist.

characters.name: Barbara
characters.title: Deaconess of the Church of Favonius
characters.description: She is the deaconess of the Church of Favonius and a prominent "idol" after learning about them from the intrepid adventurer Alice.

talents.name: Whisper of Water
talents.description: Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

talents.name: Let the Show Begin
talents.description: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them.

talents.name: Shining Miracle
talents.description: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

characters.name: Bennett
characters.title: Leader of Benny's Adventure Team
characters.description: An orphan discovered by an elderly adventurer as a baby, Bennett was raised in Mondstadt's Adventurers' Guild. He is the one and only member of "Benny's Adventure Team," as everyone else left the team after experiencing the constant misfortune that follows him.

talents.name: Strike of Fortune
talents.description: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes. When charged, consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

talents.name: Passion Overload
talents.description: Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...

talents.name: Fantastic Voyage
talents.description: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field. Provide HP regeneration based on Bennett's max HP and ATK bonus based on Bennet's Base ATK

characters.name: Fischl
characters.title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung
characters.description: She is an investigator for Mondstadt's Adventurers' Guild, accompanied by the night raven Oz. A daring adventurer with seemingly outlandish theories that happen to turn out to be true, she claims to hail from a world beyond Teyvat.

talents.name: Bolts of Downfall
talents.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.

talents.name: Nightrider
talents.description: Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE. For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel.

talents.name: Midnight Phantasmagoria
talents.description: Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl. Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed. Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to opponents she comes into contact with.

characters.name: Xiangling
characters.title: Head Chef of the Wanmin Restaurant
characters.description: She is the Head Chef at the Wanmin Restaurant and runs it alongside her father Chef Mao. As a chef, Xiangling isn't afraid to try out different recipes or "exotic" ingredients, making her dishes sometimes quite unique.

talents.name: Dough-Fu
talents.description: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes. When charged, consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

talents.name: Guoba Attack
talents.description: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

talents.name: Pyronado
talents.description: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path.

characters.name: Qiqi
characters.title: Pharmacist, Bubu Pharmacy
characters.description: Resurrected as a zombie by the adepti, she has ended up in Baizhu's care and now works at Bubu Pharmacy in Liyue Harbor.

talents.name: Ancient Sword Art
talents.description: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes. When charged, consumes a certain amount Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

talents.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
talents.description: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents. On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates based on Qiqi's ATK.

talents.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
talents.description: Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG. When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.

characters.name: Chongyun
characters.title: Banisher of Evil and Rumors Thereof
characters.description: Born with an excess of yang (positive) energy, Chongyun has become a highly effective exorcist in Liyue — so effective to the point where he hasn't seen a spirit himself, as they immediately flee when he approaches.

talents.name: Demonbane
talents.description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes. Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents. At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

talents.name: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
talents.description: Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG. After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field.

talents.name: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
talents.description: Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.

characters.name: Mona
characters.title: Enigmatic Astrologer
characters.description: An astrologist of knowledgeable skill and high pride, Mona has settled in Mondstadt to avoid suffering the ire of her master after unwittingly reading the latter's diary.

talents.name: Ripple of Fate
talents.description: Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG. When Charged, consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG.

talents.name: Phantom
talents.description: Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts. The phantom continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire and deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents. When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

talents.name: Stellaris Phantasm
talents.description: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE. This trap applies wet status and renders weaker opponents immobile.

characters.name: Keqing
characters.title: Outrider of the Knights of Favonious
characters.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best - albeit only - Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

talents.name: Sharpshooter
talents.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

talents.name: Explosive Puppet
talents.description: Baron Bunny continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

talents.name: Fiery Rain
talents.description: Fires of a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.

talents.name: Explosive Puppet
talents.description: Baron Bunny continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

talents.name: Fiery Rain
talents.description: Fires of a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.
